msg.msgText: The client request to publish a message to the server failed because the topic is a system topic: ConnectionID={0} ClientID={1} Protocol={2} Endpoint={3}.

msgExplanation.p: A message could not be published because the topic name starts with $SYS. These topics are reserved for use by the Message Gateway server. In MQTT it is also not valid to use a will topic starting with $SYS. This log entry is shown only once per connection.

msgUserResponse.p: Do not sent a message on a topic name starting with $SYS.
